body:
Help me

could you please

I'm am temp banned but have the need to play.

I said at my temp ban, eh, i'll just wait it out with no delay.

But, right now i'm extremely bored.

so please 

Help me

title: I'm desperate.

replies.body:
You have to have patience.
Patience brings Success.
Also, that is a lot of infractions you have there
You have to learn to behave on Avicus
Nolan did this to teach you this lesson.
Sorry Mate, but you have to wait.
Just Appeal Again and Wait.
Making a Forum Post doesn't help your Appeal.
